# Big D's Tree Service

> Local tree service in Janesville, Wisconsin focused on safe tree removal, pruning, stump grinding, and emergency storm cleanup.

## Business Snapshot
- Name: Big D's Tree Service
- Service Area: Janesville + Rock, Walworth, Jefferson, Dane, Racine Counties (WI)
- Phone: (262) 215-0497
- Email: bigdstrees33@gmail.com
- Website: https://bigdstreeservice.com/
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BigDsTreeService

## Primary Services
- Tree Removal
- Tree Pruning / Trimming
- Stump Grinding
- Emergency Storm Cleanup
- Land Clearing / Forestry Mulching
- Tree Planting

## Audience
- Homeowners
- Rental property owners
- Small commercial property managers

## Contact Preference
Call or text first for urgent tree hazards, then submit photos through quote form when possible.
